channel.title: Home on More Than Code
channel.description: Recent content in Home on More Than Code

item.title: Services
item.description: Available services Consultancy As an experienced developer, I can advise you about the future of your software and which direction to steer it to stay relevant. I can guide your team towards that goal by implementing best practices, automated testing and to set up continous integration so these improvements make it to production. Moving to the cloud When lift and shift falls short, it can be advantageous to look into more sustainable and cost efficient ways to utilise the cloud.

item.title: Mission
item.description: My mission The mission of More Than Code, my mission, is to improve the quality of software. When the quality of a codebase improves, the quality of the product improves as well. Features can be implemented more easily and with less bugs. I want to achieve this mission by adhering to my values. Values I think are shared by many other developers in the community. I am reliable and punctual I keep my promises, even if there is no contract involved.
